channel.title: [Delta]A ::Restart command
channel.description: I want to add a ::Restart command that combines the ::update command but actually shuts the server down and restarts it by itself. I ripped the update command and have pretty much it all figured out I just need to figure out a method that would help me restart the server. Thanks in advance. :o

item.title: [Delta]A ::Restart command
item.dc:creator: @Rawox Rawox
item.description:
@Rawox wrote:

I want to add a ::Restart command that combines the ::update command but actually shuts the server down and restarts it by itself. I ripped the update command and have pretty much it all figured out I just need to figure out a method that would help me restart the server. Thanks in advance. :o
